ministry.name: Radio Ministry
ministry.overview: The Radio Ministry is a part of "Calvary Continuum", the broadcast portion of the Multi-Media Ministry.

long-description.p: The Radio Ministry produces the Calvary Continuum radio show on KIXL 970 AM, Monday through Friday at noon and 7:30 PM. The show is comprised of 30 minute segments from past messages.
The Calvary Continuum radio show can also be heard in Waco and surrounding areas, on KBW 1010 AM, weekdays at 9:30 AM
